meanings.definition: A condition in which two or more digits are fused together.
meanings.sent1: Syndactylism can make it difficult to separate fingers.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that syndactylism is when fingers are stuck together.
meanings.sent3: During the game of tag, his syndactylism made it hard to count his fingers!
meanings.sent4: Her syndactylism was like having a permanent finger puppet show.
meanings.sent5: The image of syndactylism stuck in my mind like fingers glued together.

meanings.definition: The abnormal fusion of fingers or toes.
meanings.sent1: The syndactylism of his toes made it challenging to wear shoes.
meanings.sent2: The baby was born with syndactylism, causing the toes to be joined together.
meanings.sent3: His syndactylism was a hit at the costume party, as he dressed up as a mutant with fused toes.
meanings.sent4: The syndactylism of the branches in the forest created a natural archway.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting depicted syndactylism in a mesmerizing and surreal way.
